title: Contagion Crew Show
description:
Zack has COVID; Matt had a very problematic drive to Las Vegas; his wife's Nissan Pao arrived with some special information; we talk about why rally cars will always feel cheap; help a fan buy a winter beater, a fast SUV, and a grand tourer; answer the uncommon "Civic Si or Corvette?" question; and take a guess at which car/watch combo would lose the least amount of money. 

Recorded, April 29, 2022

 

Go to blackvue.com/TST to learn more about the BlackVue DMS dash cam lineup. Use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200.
 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire16 and use code smokingtire16 for up to 16 free meals AND 3 free gifts!
 

Evercoat Body Shop takes the guesswork out of body work. Available at Advance Auto Part stores.
 

GO TO TENTHOUSAND.CC/SMOKING TO RECEIVE 15% OFF YOUR PURCHASE!

 

Tweet at us! https://www.Twitter.com/thesmokingtire https://www.Twitter.com/zackklapman Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/thesmokingtire https://www.Instagram.com/therealzackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
